verses.roman:
haridāsa kare goṅphāya nāma-saṅkīrtana
kṛṣṇa avatīrṇa ha-ibena,--ei tāṅra mana

synonyms: haridāsa—Haridāsa Ṭhākura; kare—performed; goṅphāya—in the cave; nāma-saṅkīrtana—chanting of the holy name of the Lord; kṛṣṇa—Lord Kṛṣṇa; avatīrṇa ha-ibena—will descend; ei—this; tāṅra mana—his mind.
translation: Similarly, Haridāsa Ṭhākura chanted in his cave on the bank of the Ganges with the intention to cause Kṛṣṇa's descent.
